TopicTitle: mk1 LF and mk2 LFO tanks gone

Articles.Content: I can't find the mk1 LF and mk2 LFO tanks anymore. both on a modded and non modded install they aren't there. I can't find anything in the patchnotes. how do I get them back? I have crafts saved with the parts.

Sorry nobody has replied to you in a few days.

 

Assuming you're talking about these....

 

They are still in v1.7. Sometimes parts disappear from the install (or get corrupted) during an update. If you're on steam, try validating the files (right-click->Properties->Local Files tab->Verify integrity of game files). If that doesn't work, then you can try copying your save files somewhere safe...then delete KSP and reinstall it.

Edited August 17, 2019 by Claw
